title: GUTS (Geeta University Test of Scholarship)
description: University's own scholarship examination open to all applicants. Students can earn up to 100% scholarship on tuition fee based on their GUTS score. This scholarship multiplies a candidate's eligibility and can be availed even if not eligible for other scholarships.
eligibility: All students applying for admission to any UG/PG/Diploma/PhD program
application: Appear for GUTS exam during admission process

title: Merit-Based Scholarship
description: Awarded based on academic performance in qualifying examinations. For UG programs, percentage in Class 12th board exams is considered. For PG programs, Bachelor's degree marks are evaluated. Scholarships range from 10% to 100% of tuition fee.
benefits: 10% to 100% tuition fee waiver based on marks
eligibility: Minimum 50% marks in qualifying examination (varies by program)

title: National Entrance Test Scholarship
description: Scholarships for high performers in national level entrance examinations including JEE Main, CUET, MAT, CAT, GATE, XAT, CMAT, NMAT, and CLAT. Performance percentile determines scholarship amount.
eligibility: Valid score in recognized national entrance examination

title: Sports Scholarship
description: Recognition and financial support for students who have demonstrated exceptional talent in sports. Available for those who have participated or won at District, State, National or International level sports competitions.
benefits: 10% to 50% tuition fee waiver depending on achievement level
documentation: Certificates from recognized sports authorities required

title: Social Responsibility Scholarship
description: Special concessions and financial aid for deserving students from specific backgrounds to ensure education is accessible to all. Demonstrates university's commitment to social equity and inclusive education.
categories: Children of Defense Personnel (Army, Navy, Air Force)
documentation: Valid certificates and proof of category required

title: Sibling Scholarship
description: Concession offered when more than one sibling from the same family is enrolled at Geeta University simultaneously.
benefits: 5% to 10% tuition fee waiver per sibling
eligibility: Two or more siblings studying at GU at the same time
